name: Wailmer

evolution.description: Wailmer can evolve into Wailord at level 10 and above. When it evolves, its health increases by double its level, and it gains 5 points to add to its ability scores (max 20).

description: The Ball Whale Pokémon. Wailmer's nostrils are located above its eyes. This playful Pokémon loves to startle people by forcefully snorting out seawater it stores inside its body out of its nostrils.

abilities.name: Water Veil
abilities.description: This Pokémon is immune to burning.

abilities.name: Oblivious
abilities.description: This Pokémon is immune to moves that attempt to charm or taunt it.

abilities.name: Pressure
abilities.description: Any move targeting this Pokémon directly (non-area of effect moves) reduces its PP by two when activated.
